remove_intent_transformer.description: Replace Intent Transformer with rule-based heuristics
remove_intent_transformer.explanation: Rule-based intent prediction lacks adaptability to dynamic user behavior patterns

remove_delay_risk_gnn.description: Replace GNN with rule-based delay risk estimation
remove_delay_risk_gnn.explanation: Rule-based approach cannot capture complex interdependencies in supply network

remove_rule_guardrails.description: Use ML-only baselines without rule-based safety checks
remove_rule_guardrails.explanation: Without guardrails, system produces more constraint violations

remove_ppo_agent.description: Replace PPO with greedy policy selection
remove_ppo_agent.explanation: Greedy policy fails to optimize multiple objectives simultaneously

remove_orchestrator.description: Direct model calls without coordination layer
remove_orchestrator.explanation: Without orchestration, models fail independently without graceful degradation

methodology.baseline_rules: Established business heuristics for intent and delay risk
methodology.baseline_ml: LSTM for intent, Logistic Regression for delay risk
methodology.test_set: Identical test sets used for all configurations
metrics: Overall accuracy (average of Intent and GNN accuracy)
